stimulusHtml: At what rate is the length of the hypotenuse of the triangle increasing, in centimeters per second, at that instant?

features.html: An isosceles right triangle with legs of length s has area A = 1 2 s 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3BA5@ . At the instant when s= 32 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@39C5@ centimeters, the area of the triangle is increasing at a rate of 12 square centimeters per second.
